EmailTemplate.description: On a Prorate Request, when 14 OR 7 OR 3 days are remaining to reply before the 60-day-limit, an email is sent to the Airline Receiving and mentions the 14 OR 7 OR 3 remaining days. Related WFs: ISSP_PIR_Alert+Status on ISSUER's Comment Date + ISSP_PIR_Alert+Status on RECEIVER's Comment Date
EmailTemplate.name: ISSP_PIR_XDays_before_60Day_Limit
EmailTemplate.subject: Days remaining to reply to Prorate Request
